description: Being a guitar player in his own band, Spanish born Diesel is a natural performer and despite having tied the knot a couple of years ago, he had a fantasy of making an X rated video and luckily for me, I was the ones who got to make that come true.Those deep eyes of his just exude a raw sexual energy that's almost hypnotic and he couldn't wait to get naked. The huge bulge in his underwear showed just how turned on he was by the very idea and what a showman he is.From giving that thick, fat 8.5? a shave, to taking a shower, to working his hole and dick, he built up a load one hell of a load and when he finally emptied those nuts, he pumped enough sperm it took two towels to wipe it all up. Not sure what he could possibly do for an encore, but I can't wait to find out!
title: Smooth Operator, Scene #02
